TopicTitle: What time exactly will .23 launch on December 17th?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I am wondering if .23 will be launching at midnight or if there is some set time that we can expect the download to be available later in the day. That is all.

And so the spam begins...

On topic: they probably won't say exactly when it will be released
Usually the KSP release goes live during office hours in Mexico.. though I cannot tell you exactly when, because I don't know

Usually the KSP release goes live during office hours in Mexico.. though I cannot tell you exactly when, because I don't know

Yep, it is not normally especially early, so probably best that you do not ditch work or school... I think .22 came out around 5pm central time.. Ppl were in here all day being impatient. So, please don't have expectations, just have patience.
Anywhere between 11AM ( US Central/Mexico city ) And 6PM is my guess based on previous releases. But don't take my word for it, please.
Patience, you`ll life will still be beautiful even if it's launched on 17th at 23h59
It is Monday, 20:57 pm in Moscow right now, it would be great if the game was released at midnight in every time zone

patience, you`ll life will still be beautiful even if it's launched on 17th at 23h59

23:59? Utc? Cst?

It's actually delayed by two months while they put resources in.

Damn, you beat me on this one ^^
Somewhere between 12:01 am to 11:59 pm is about as close as I can guess. I do not think there was an official time stated though.

It's actually delayed by two months while they put resources in.

This made me LOL. I'd wait two months for 0.23 if they were going to put resources in!

But on a serious note, it'll probably come out some time in the afternoon their local time, so depending on where you live (I'm at EST so I'll probably get it in the evening) you may have to wait more or less (after midnight I mean).

Patience, you`ll life will still be beautiful even if it's launched on 17th at 23h59

PATIENCE?! I want it YESTERDAY! Seriously, science lab me.
I'll have to wait till Wednesday if it comes out late on Tuesday due to timezones.

I'll have to wait till Wednesday if it comes out late on Tuesday due to timezones.

This, it's like Steam, if they say Tuesday it'll be Wednesday...SQUAD didn't have the good decency to move to New Zealand when they started....

This, it's like Steam, if they say Tuesday it'll be Wednesday...

Not sure what you mean by that. For 0.22 at least, Steam was pushing out the update within about 30 seconds of Squad saying it was live. I was launching the new version about 2 minutes later.

The spam cometh!

Should we keep Steam opened, or keep logging in and logging out? LOL

Not sure what you mean by that. For 0.22 at least, Steam was pushing out the update within about 30 seconds of Squad saying it was live. I was launching the new version about 2 minutes later.

They meant that due to time zones the update is released on Wednesday for that part of the world, rather than a complaint on the speed of steam.
Personally I would release it at midnight GMT

They meant that due to time zones the update is released on Wednesday for that part of the world, rather than a complaint on the speed of steam.

D'oh! *falcepalm*

I should've realized that.

Well for those of us in the "correct" timezone who have to work for a living, late in the day is as good as early anyway.
Every time someone asks, it's pushed back one hour!

Midnight release seems a bit much to ask of a small company, I would expect a daytime release so they can attempt to handle any issues before calling it a day. It would be much worse if they released it while they were sleeping.

If this doesn't work for some impatient people, vote with your wallet and take up a collection to keep 4-5 extra people on staff for the overnights on release dates.

They have to release while someone's 'at the helm' so they can handle it if we all pile onto the download server and crush it.

My guess is some time in the afternoon, Squad local. My personal 'release date' in my mind is 'I'll be able to play it when I wake up Wednesday.' Anything I get to do on Tuesday between an afternoon release and download time is gravy. Delicious, spacey science gravy.

HHUUUUu,

(trumpets sound to the Kentucky Debbie opening music)

*Announcer* "ladys and gentlemen. boys and girls! its time for what was inevitable! The moment we all knew would come, With impatience high and anticipation and excitement even higher, I would like to announce that the first of many spam threads has just been born! let the forum spassing

BEGIN!"

in all seriousness just wait till 12:00 on Wednesday it will save you frustration and many curses in the future :/

Every time someone asks, it's pushed back one hour!

hmmmm the trolldar is high with this one

Every time someone asks, it's pushed back one hour!

Face palm: imagine the howls of pain !
Announcing the day is risky enough for the servers, announcing the exact time would be suicide.
